name: Exam 2021 Game
description:
This is my unity Exam game for Sem 1 2021.

I tried to do as much as I could do around exams but failed to complete level 8, the two custom levels, adding music to my level and a game over screen.

Overall im quite happy with the outcome as the levels I do have are really polished and I think its quite a bit better than my Last game showing that I am improving.

References.

Emoji characters : https://getemoji.com/

Lives Ui icon : https://admurin.itch.io/ui-wood-theme

Buttons and bouncy pad: https://kicked-in-teeth.itch.io/button-ui

Portal : https://actuallykron.itch.io/32x32-2d-portal-asset-pack

The Tiles i used : https://nearestneighbor.itch.io/platformer-brick-tileset

Background: Brackeys https://brackeysgames.itch.io/date-night
